import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from 'axios' import { useHistory, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; const AddUser = () => { let history = useHistory(); const { id } = useParams(); const [user, setUser] = useState({ fname: "", lname: "", email: "", phone: "", caddress: "", paddress: "", course: "", college: "", year: "", cgpa: "", cname: "", desig: "", doj: "", dor: "" }); const { fname, lname, email, phone, caddress, paddress,course, college, year, cgpa, cname, desig, doj, dor } = user; const onInputChange = e => { setUser({ ...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const onSubmit = async e => { e.preventDefault(); await axios.post("http://localhost:3003/users", user); history.push("/"); }; return (
